item.title: Two years after the disappearance of Malaysia Airlines jet MH370 and still no answer for grieving families
item.description: For the families of those on board missing flight MH370, answers are still required. Eileen Ng in Kuala Lumpur and Kristen Gelineau in Sydney report on the extraordinary underwater search for the vanished Boeing 777
item.author: Eileen Ng, KRISTEN GELINEAU
item.dc:creator: Eileen Ng, KRISTEN GELINEAU
item.media:text: A woman writes messages for the passengers of flight MH370 on a banner during a remembrance ceremony to mark the second anniversary of the plane's disappearance in Kuala Lumpur (Picture: [copyright])
